transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Sir Harish Patra speaking IndiaMART se kaise hain sir?
Customer: Boliye theek hai ji.
Executive: Ah sir thoda sa video meeting ke liye call kiya tha theek hai Avinash aapke account manager hai main unka manager hun theek hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To baar baar complaint yehi aa rahe hai sir ki inquiry nahi aa rahi hai business nahi mil raha hai sir theek hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To aapko link share karwa do sir video meeting ke liye sir.
Customer: Bilkul nahi.
Executive: Ek to main aapse kuch batana chahunga kaam ka time hai ek to aapki taraf se kaam nahi hai aur jo dusre aa rahe hain woh bhi abhi disturb hoga.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Number ek.
Customer: Hum karenge video meeting jarurat meri to kal bhi hui thi roz hoti hai.
Customer: Aap aapka to kaam hi yehi hai aapka to kitne ghante meeting hui kya hui kya hua aap to record mein dal dete ho hamara to time waste ho raha hai na.
Executive: To sir aapki jo complaint hai sun lijiye sir sun lijiye puri baat to suno mere bhai puri baat se puri baat to sun lo.
Customer: Secondly main ye bolna chah raha tha ki number ek clear hone ke baad hum dusre pe aayenge pehle hume clear karo export ke regarding to aapki taraf se koi response nahi tha payment refund karne wali baat hui thi uska kya bana baki to chalo inquiry lead nahi hai woh fake hai woh to baad ki baat hai karenge.
Customer: Export wala to main clear karo jo payment aapne li hai aapka reach nahi hai waha tak to uske liye do teen manager aapke aaye gaye kabhi koi senior phone karta hai kabhi koi senior phone karta hai to uska solution kyun nahi nikal raha kyunki 6 mahine se baatein kar rahe hain.
Customer: To 6 mahine se baat karne ka matlab yehi hai aapka to time renewal ka aa jayega fir aap bologe sir aapne pehle nahi bataya ab to renewal ka time aa gaya to uske liye aapne kya kar rahe ho aap log.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir renewal ka time to aayega hi sir woh to time jaise jaise niklega woh renewal ka time aayega.
Customer: Nahi to hum log free mein thodi na baithe hain ki aapko free mein renewal kar karke dete rahe kya baat karte ho aap.
Executive: Sir woh aapka bhi ek baar aapko samjhaya gaya ki bhai iska jawab do to goliyan aap log bewakoof bana rahe ho meeting pe meeting kar rahe ho koi answer koi jawab hai nahi aapke pass to kya faltu ka meeting karna aapse kya matlab hai.
Customer: Aapko mainly export pe problem hai na sir.
Customer: Main aapko kuch batata hun kam chal raha hai ki mazak chal raha hai idhar.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Export se domestic aapka sahi chal raha hai right.
Customer: Sir kuch bhi sahi nahi chal raha nothing is going right.
Customer: Useless hai.
Customer: Aur record mein aapko bataya gaya hai main mere bolne se nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Na inquiry ki aapka response hai na lead ka response hai na export ka response hai main 10 saal se IndiaMART kar raha hun itni bekar service to kabhi nahi thi jo abhi hai.
Customer: Aur koi banda jimmevari lene ke liye tayar nahi hai to hamara to payment laga hai na bhai.
Executive: Sir dekho sir bekar hoti to aapke pass 600 inquiry nahi aati sir.
Customer: Sir inquiry ka main kya karunga nahi aati sir.
Customer: Nahi inquiry ka kya karunga aap ek deal karke dikhao.
Executive: Sir aap conversion inquiry aapki sari fake inquiry dal rahe ho ya dalwa rahe ho hume kya pata.
Customer: Aap inquiry dal rahe ho ki de rahe ho aap inquiry kya hai leads kya hai iske upar baat karoge ki sirf record pe chaloge.
Executive: Sir ek bhi inquiry aur ek bhi buylead fake nahi aati sir.
Customer: Saari fakes hai aap mere ko deal karke baat karke batao jaha aapko doubt hai ek random number bata do kis se deal baat kar le.
Customer: Meri bheji gayi inquiry thodi na hai leade thodi na hai aapko dikh raha hai sara batao kis party se baat kare kaunsi inquiry pe kaunsi lead pe baat karna hai jisse deal ho rahi hai ya baat hua ho.
Executive: Sir aap koi bhi buylead ka number aap de dijiye main laga leta hun aapke samne to aur ek bhi buyer nahi bolega ki maine requirement nahi dali thi.
Executive: Theek hai aap lagao.
Customer: Jaldi se bol raha hai galti se lag gaya hume nahi chahiye beech mein phone kat raha hai woh kehta hai baar baar call mat karo.
Customer: Humne to pehli baar hi phone kiya woh bol raha hai baar baar call mat karo kya matlab iska matlab usko humse pehle 10 call ja chuki hai.
Executive: 100 mein se sir ek do buylead pe aisa customer ka voice aata hai.
Customer: Aapke kehne pe main thodi na jaunga subah se leke sham tak yehi karta hun main.
Executive: Nahi aap sahi baat keh rahe ho aap karte ho 600 inquiry aa rahi hai to sir koi na koi to follow karega na usko.
Customer: Mujhe solution chahiye pehle export ka uske baad dusre pe main baat karunga aap log mix kar dete ho na idhar ka hota hai na udhar ka hota hai ek clear karo fir dusre pe aate hain.
Customer: Export ka aapka reach nahi hai aapke staff ne aapne khud mana hai ki hamari usme koi pahunch nahi hai na hamare export pe kuch chal raha hai to aapne uski jo payment le rakhi hai jo huge amount uska kya kar rahe ho aap refund kar rahe ho ki kya kar rahe ho.
Customer: Uska kya solution hai aapke pass ye mere ko batao.
Executive: Export mein thoda sa constructive follow karne ke baad time lagta hai theek hai process.
Customer: Sir ye 6 mahine thodi na time lag jayega yaar kya baat hai aapne jo service aapne jo services le rakhi hai aap jaan bujh ke time waste kar rahe ho kharab kar rahe ho ki kab time inka khatam ho aur ye topic khatam ho.
Executive: Sir ek ek column pe time lagta hai sir export mein sir.
Customer: Ek to bahut sare jo hamare supplier hai woh sir aap mere ko mat ginao ki bahut sare supplier hain ye hain woh hain mujhe kya lena dena mere ko apne kaam se matlab hai aapse matlab hai mere ko duniyadari mat batao bhai mere ko duniyadari mat batao.
Executive: Aap hi to bol rahe hain na sir ki valid hai.
Customer: Aap hi to bol rahe hain na sir ki valid hai bahut sare inquiry hai puri baat mat suno beech mein mat bolo main ye bol raha hun ki aap mere ko kyun bata rahe ho sari partiya jo hai woh hai ye customer hai mere ko kya lena dena unse.
Executive: Aapko to bataunga sir.
Customer: Mujhe kyun bataoge.
Customer: Mere sawalon ka jawab do aap mujhe third teesre bande se kya lena third party se.
Executive: Third party ka main aapko example de raha hun.
Customer: Main naya to khel nahi raha hun ki mere ko ab naya aap hoge do char mahine saal do saal se main 10 saal se hun IndiaMART pe.
Executive: Acchi baat hai sir aap 10 saal se aapko IndiaMART mila hai tabhi to aap 10 saal se sir aap.
Customer: Nahi mil raha tha na ab nahi mil raha na is saal se to main kisko bolunga mil raha tha jab mil raha tha to theek tha abhi nahi hai to bolunga main.
Executive: Sir aap ek baat batao 10 saal se apne aapko upgrade nahi karenge upgrade nahi karenge to obviously sir business milna band ho jayega.
Customer: Bhai dekho kahan se 3000 5000 se shuru kiya tha ab 2 lakh 2.5 lakh de raha hun ab bina upgrade kiye hi chal raha hai continue.
Executive: Sir aap hamare kehne ka ye matlab hai bhai sahab ki aap upgrade karao aayega nahi to nahi aayega.
Customer: Sir aapne service ko upgrade sir aapne service ko upgrade nahi kiya hai sir aapne payment terms ko upgrade kar main kyun karunga main kyun karunga jab mera accha service pehle chal raha tha sab kuch chal raha tha.
Executive: Sir market mein competition hai sir theek hai aap upgrade nahi karoge to sab piche reh jayenge sir aap.
Customer: Hame jitna aata hai na aur aapke jo manager hain jaise woh guide karte hain waise hi update se hum chalte hain aap ye mat bolo aapke upar blame mat lagao ki update nahi kar rahe hain.
Executive: Sir bilkul yehi hume hume kaam kaise karna hai hume mat batao aap aapko apne kaam karne kaise karna hai basic aap wo nahi kar pa rahe ho aur hume bata rahe ho ki update kaise karna hai suniye na sir ek ek thoda stats le lijiye 600 inquiry aur 150 call kisi bhi.
Customer: Sir iske alawa aap logo ko kuch aata hi nahi hai iske alawa kuch nahi aata 600 inquiry 400 call ye call 400 call mein kya char char bando se deal nahi hona chahiye.
Customer: Hamara call aata hai aadha ghanta customer dimag kharab karta hai sari baat karta hai baad mein payment bolta hai main IndiaMART ke through karunga aapke pass payment gateway hai nahi koi service koi support hai nahi koi toota sa banda aata hai one star deke chala jata hai aapke pass removal ka aapke pass option hai nahi.
Executive: Sir ye hum karenge sir kyun remove karenge aapka buyer ke sath kya discussion chal raha hai kis tarike se aapne uske sath aap lo na aapke pass recording hai sab kuch to hai aapke pass nikalo recording.
Executive: Itna time nahi hai ki ek ek buyer ko hum response karte rahe sir isliye main video meeting mein bula raha tha.
Customer: Dekho mere pass time nahi hai main to seedha message chahunga ya email dalunga mere ko aap 24 ghante ke andar mere ko jawab do ki export ka payment aap kar rahe ho ki nahi kar rahe ho to fir main legal action lunga.
Customer: Seedhi baat hai.
Executive: Theek hai alright.
Customer: Aapse nahi ho raha hai to ye toote foote manager hain aap koi bhi pakda dete ho ye jab se ladka aaya hai iske iske hath se to bilkul beda ghar gaya iske pehle monika thi woh to kar rahi thi kuch ye to sirf time pass hi hai kabhi monday kabhi tuesday kabhi bahar hun kabhi ye hun kabhi isse baat karta hun kabhi usse baat karta hun first of all change the manager ye nahi chahiye mere ko clearly aur secondly mere ko 24 ghante ke andar jawab do export ka yes or no fir aage hum aapse baat karenge ya kya karenge to kya ho gaya ki hum aapko six month de chuke hain.
Executive: Theek hai main apne senior ko aap payment leke bewakoof nahi bana sakte customer ko nahi to main apne lawyer se baat karunga ki IndiaMART ke khilaf kya action liya ja sakta hai.
Executive: Sir ye sir woh to aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- No inquiries or business received.

- No response regarding export.

- Payment refund not processed.

- Fake inquiries and leads.

- Lack of support and service.

- Negative reviews and no removal option.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meeting.

- Executive asked for a buylead number to verify.

- Executive stated export takes time for follow-up.

- Executive will inform senior about the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Customer wants a response within 24 hours.

- Customer will take legal action if unresolved.



Alert (If Any):

refund
escalation

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- export, refund, inquiries, leads, payment, service
